text: Tadataka "Tachi" Yamada MD, KBE (山田忠孝 Yamada Tadataka or "ターチ Tachi"; 5 June 1945 – 4 August 2021) was a Japanese-born American physician and gastroenterologist. He was born in Tokyo. He was an executive for Frazier Healthcare Partners. Yamada received an honorary appointment as Knight Commander of the Order of the British Empire. Yamada died on 4 August 2021 in Seattle, Washington from a heart attack at the age of 76.Tachi Yamada, Physician-Scientist-Biopharma Industry Leader, Dies at 76 ==References== Category:1945 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Japanese scientists Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:American physicians Category:Businesspeople from Tokyo Category:Businesspeople from Seattle
title: Tachi Yamada
